body: I've got 3 monitors (well, TVs).  Pages 31,32,33 are freaking awesome backgrounds.  Its nice when the Nazis don't win, in my book.  So unlike real life, where they just packed their bags and started working for the USA and the tail end of the war, courtesy Operation Paperclip & the Vatican Ratlines.  Anyway Madcat is great.. I should look him up on e[dash]hentai[dot]org.  In a very real sense, the battle between Hitler and his two nemeses is still alive- in the hearts and minds of everybody on the planet.  Those nemeses being Stalin and Einstein, btw.  I'm not much into Stalin.
